definition: to take cities and seize territories (idiom)

sentences.english: The general commanded his men to attack the city.
Increase all damage from Siege Engine and its turrets.
sentences.chinese: 增加攻城車以及其炮塔的所有傷害。

sentences.english: Like when the Siegebreaker bit the Barbarian in half during the gameplay demo .
sentences.chinese: 比如在演示視頻中那個野蠻人被攻城獸撕成了兩半。

sentences.english: He led the main strength of his army against the city.
The Babylonians who are attacking this city will come in and set it on fire;
sentences.chinese: 攻城的迦勒底人必來放火焚燒這城和其中的房屋。

sentences.english: In the capital city we have scenarios that become active and that I can fight for your capital city.
sentences.chinese: 在城裏會激活一些情節，這時我們將能夠發動攻城戰。

sentences.english: Like the Seige Tank (in Seige Mode), it can't attack the unit that is too close to it.
sentences.chinese: 類似於坦克的攻城模式有死角，不能攻擊過近的單位。

sentences.english: Fortunately, that is not their plan.
sentences.chinese: 幸運的是，武力攻城並非他們的計劃。

sentences.english: These artillery pieces resemble giant crossbows , on a simple wheeled carriage.
sentences.chinese: 這種攻城器實際上是一個裝在輪式載具上的大弩。

sentences.english: All of Escalade's standard comfort and convenience features are included.
sentences.chinese: 在攻城的標準的舒適和便利的功能都包括在內。

sentences.english: I dream of becoming sales personnel, in business experience GongChengLveDe stimulation.
sentences.chinese: 我夢想成爲銷售人員，在商場上體會攻城略地的刺激。

sentences.english: The fact that they were Muslim made them more appetizing to conquer, not less.
sentences.chinese: 事實上穆斯林使他們熱衷於攻城略地。

sentences.english: Increase siege damage from Glaive Thrower.
sentences.chinese: 增加投刃車的攻城傷害。

sentences.english: The Yang sees 5 sets of live we does this offend a city war?
sentences.chinese: 央視五套直播咱們這場攻城戰？

sentences.english: In April, Ogadai returned northwards leaving Subotai to continue to attack the city.
sentences.chinese: 四月，窩闊臺北還，留速不臺繼續攻城。

sentences.english: He that can take rest is greater than he that can take cities.
sentences.chinese: 能夠休息的人，比能攻城掠地的人更偉大。

definition: defensive structure/military fortifications/(Tw) construction works/civil engineering works
